name: Protect Your Boss!
description:
Protect your boss!!

this game is  for bullet hell jam 

story

one day you and your boss are chilling in the park. but suddenly your boss was kidnapped by some one. and jailed in some cave. you decied to pick your gun again since  many years and your power to control the block. and go Protect Your Boss!
